analysis.description:
CoinifinexToken (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#5-229) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#129-133)
CoinifinexToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#21-22)
tokenRecipient.receiveApproval (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#3) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#129-133) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#138-149) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.approveAndCall (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#170-184) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.burn (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#186-197) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.burnFrom (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#202-214) should be declared external
CoinifinexToken.getTeamFund (/unique_contracts/0x6dee0a976370ee9f0f8c4619ab3386441a42ceb3.sol#214-229) should be declared external
